quotes.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Spread love everywhere you go. Let no one ever come to you without leaving happier.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Whoever is happy will make others happy too.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine - and shadows will fall behind you.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: You will face many defeats in life, but never let yourself be defeated.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Never let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game.
quotes.author: Babe Ruth

quotes.quote: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.quote: You have within you right now, everything you need to deal with whatever the world can throw at you.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: What we achieve inwardly will change outer reality.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.quote: When you reach the end of your rope, tie a knot in it and hang on.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says 'I'm possible'!
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

quotes.quote: I can't change the direction of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination.
quotes.author: Jimmy Dean

quotes.quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: You become what you believe.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: I would rather die of passion than of boredom.
quotes.author: Vincent van Gogh

quotes.quote: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The power of imagination makes us infinite.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Dream big and dare to fail.
quotes.author: Norman Vaughan

quotes.quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: If you can dream it, you can achieve it.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: The best revenge is massive success.
quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

quotes.quote: You must expect great things of yourself before you can do them.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
quotes.author: Vidal Sassoon

quotes.quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
quotes.author: Alan Kay

quotes.quote: The harder I work, the luckier I get.
quotes.author: Gary Player

quotes.quote: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.quote: You can't connect the dots looking forward; you can only connect them looking backward.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.
quotes.author: Colin R. Davis

quotes.quote: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: There are no shortcuts to any place worth going.
quotes.author: Beverly Sills

quotes.quote: I attribute my success to this: I never gave or took any excuse.
quotes.author: Florence Nightingale

quotes.quote: You can't fall if you don't climb. But there's no joy in living your whole life on the ground.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Believe in yourself! Have faith in your abilities! Without a humble but reasonable confidence in your own powers you cannot be successful or happy.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: If you really look closely, most overnight successes took a long time.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
quotes.author: Charles Kingsleigh

quotes.quote: Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: The only thing standing between you and your goal is the story you keep telling yourself as to why you can't achieve it.
quotes.author: Jordan Belfort

quotes.quote: The best dreams happen when you're awake.
quotes.author: Cherie Gilderbloom

quotes.quote: The only thing worse than being blind is having sight but no vision.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

quotes.quote: The only thing that stands between you and your dream is the will to try and the belief that it is actually possible.
quotes.author: Joel Brown

quotes.quote: The only thing that you absolutely have to know is the location of the library.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The only thing that interferes with my learning is my education.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The only thing necessary for the triumph of evil is for good men to do nothing.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The only thing worse than starting something and failing is not starting something.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: The only thing standing between you and your goal is the bullshit story you keep telling yourself as to why you can't achieve it.
quotes.author: Jordan Belfort

quotes.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.author: Charles Kingsleigh
